website_summaries.verdict: These appealingly low-cost smart bulbs are too dependent on their in-app controls, and don't actually offer much by way of automation.
pros: The C by GE Starter Pack is surprisingly affordable given that it includes color tunable bulbs that sync with your circadian rhythms
The app makes it easy to create preprogrammed scenes that you launch with a single tap
cons: As of now, you can't sync these bulbs up with any larger smart-home platforms or third-party devices, and you can't control them with voice commands, either
You also can't set basic timers or schedules for when lights should turn on and off

customer_reviews.title: Great product some bugs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. There are some bugs and you will have to reset all of your lights but once it’s set up you’re money. Word to the wise you will need more than one account if you have more than 30 lights. GE hasn’t figured out most homes have many lights in many rooms not with fans and recessed lighting options so their app can’t handle more than 30 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar.

customer_reviews.title: The system is terrible including the creach, bulbs and app.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get the CReach to work. it sorta worked at first. I have reset it multiple times, it does not connect and I have finally given up. The bulbs have worked in the past with the app, however now only one app (on my wife’s phone) works. The app on my phone does not work at all. We have given up on the entire system and are not using the bulbs except for regular bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Don Bouse

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a month before the light bulbs became disconnected and now will not Recconect have also tried resetting the bulbs and they refuse to reset. With this bundle they send you the older version of the bulb and I have 4 other bulbs of the same brand just newer version and have 0 issues with them. This one does also smell like it’s burning now when it’s plugged in and the base gets incredibly hot and my other ones do not. I emailed GE to see if they can do something because I can’t return to amazon because I need the c reach hub. Waste of money for the bulbs
customer_reviews.author: CSISiddle3

customer_reviews.title: first take:  I like it
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the hub and the first bulb, and tied them in to my Amazon Echo. So far, works as advertised and the bulb is as bright as expected. Easy to turn on/off with Alexa. I have an Eero wi-fi mesh so that I have strong wi-fi throughout the house. Next step is to check on how well the scheduling works.
customer_reviews.author: Whereupon

customer_reviews.title: Virtually worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the bulbs for a while now. They were fairly reliable on their own. I purchased this so I could control them with my echo plus ( the built in hub doesn’t work with the GE bulbs). I’ve been nothing by frustrated. I’ve reset, updated, uninstalled, reinstalled. Still loses connectivity. I’ll just flip the darn wall switch myself. This product is just no good
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great product after working out bugs
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these lights for my wife before Christmas and ended up buying 4 additional bulbs after we got them set up.. I can see why some people are frustrated.. the setup process needs some work, but once you get them working, I suggest using your apple home app (or google) to operate them.. you’ll need to have GEs app installed, but you can control them without opening the app after setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: After installation, worked immediately for one day. One ...
customer_reviews.text: After installation, worked immediately for one day. One day was it. Tried several times to get the unit to work, including many resets, and will not connect again. Turns into very expensive normal bulbs to use. Will never again buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Shahan

customer_reviews.title: Useless. Worked about two weeks then stopped
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Worked about two weeks then stopped. Had multiple frustrating email exchanges with tech support. They said something about downloading a bad firmware update but nothing worked. The light bulbs work fine but none of the bells and whistles can be accessed without the base unit working. Extremely disappointed. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Earl M. Vaughan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Bridge is impossible to get connected to Echo device. Spent hours on both ends listening to GE and Amazon blame each other and defending their product's ability to connect. Entire selection of this product was to connect to Echo. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: GWhyz

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to connect. Software had glitches
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on the C by GE bulbs at bestbuy. Tried to connect on my smartphone. Could not connect. The I read that I needed the C Reach device to communicate with Alexa. Bought the bulb and device package and still cold not get it to connect. Returned everything and bought Sengled bulbs. Connected instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. I’ve been looking for a cheaper alternative to Hue and others and this works perfectly. Setup was easy and painless. The bulbs updated their firmware as soon as I set them up along with the C-Reach hub (this allows for voice control). Google Home works beautifully with these and it recognizes their names based off the name/room you chose. Will be buying more C by GE bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget User

customer_reviews.title: Works half the time
customer_reviews.text: The voice control module is a tiny box that is easy to install into your home network. It’s just as spotty as the phone app. About half the time, the lights do not respond. Meh. I guess that’s what light switches are for?
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Not for Amazon Alexa App
customer_reviews.text: This product will not connect with my Amazon Alexa App. I’ve tried multiple times. It picks up on my WIFI, It links on the CbyGE App, but when it comes to linking to adding devices. Nothing! So At this point I started to go to the reviews and noticed this was a huge problem. Waste of time and money for use of Alexa commands. Possibly better with Google home, but I’m not a duel user.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D. Martinez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Work great with google home
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome. It took some time to get them all set up and I had to get a package with the GE hub. Now I have 16 of them throughout the house and they all work with my google home flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Dayna B.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Confusing and inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: I can't get this thing to work. I had to download another app from GE, and I've tried it have a dozen times, but I just can't make it work.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: GE seemed to put this product out with out enough testing.
customer_reviews.text: Had multiple bugs is setting up the system, unable to login, could't delete automated schedules. Got frustrated with system. I am surprised with the GE name that they put out a produce like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Strcich

customer_reviews.title: Absolute opiece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I spent 3 hours trying to connect this junk, one light connects, the other one didn't. Had to rest it 5 times, still didn't work with Google Home. Don't waste3 your time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like to have my bedside lamp on for hours and ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. They got very hot in about 10 minutes. I like to have my bedside lamp on for hours and they just got way to hot for me. Would not buy these again
customer_reviews.author: bonnie bizzell

customer_reviews.title: Thank a You, Next!
customer_reviews.text: I had way too much difficulty with these so I returned them to get something less complicated and fussy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use C-Reach! UPDATE NEEDED!
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are great, I’ve never had a problem with any C by GE bulbs. But the C-Reach itself sucks right now. They need major updates, as they the C-Reach now breaks the whole system.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Never connects to Alexa as they say they do. don't even use, would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Constant connection issues.
customer_reviews.text: Works for about 2-3 days then will disconnect. All lights will become unresponsive and you can’t control them. Only fix is to reset the bridge and bulbs and you loose all your pre settings for rooms and settings. Doesn’t integrate will with Apple home kit either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better with Alexa than Google
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, either though I couldn’t get them to pair with the bridge it came with but it could be because I have the GE Sol with built in Alexa that works perfectly as a control already set up. No issues
customer_reviews.author: Corina Savoie

customer_reviews.title: Turning on lights easy.
customer_reviews.text: I that I just tell my lights in different rooms to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Roche

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Product is awful bulbs always disappear and aren’t connected to phone constantly have to factory reset
customer_reviews.author: brendan strawbridge

customer_reviews.title: Check package carefully
customer_reviews.text: Price was good and fair however we only received one smart bulb which was a sleep bulb and a regular LED bulb and not the two regular smart bulbs that was advertised. The hub was new and works well
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! DO NOT order!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work and does not connect with Alexa as described. Only rated one star because I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well with google home. I didn't have any issues with set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have Alexa adjustable lights in the bedroom and living room. Also great for remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Labrecque

customer_reviews.title: I just received this product. The C-reach is working ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. The C-reach is working. I cannot get the C by GE app to see the life bulbs. Any ideas on how canI get them to work?
customer_reviews.author: gcx1

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect to my network. Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Will not connect to my network. This is the only thing in 10+ years that I have not been successfully able to connect to my network. Would give zero stars if possible. I only purchased this because I already have C by GE bulbs. Sad that they're allowed to sell garbage like this that doesn't work on Amazon. Perhaps I just need to be done with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Geary

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, works with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and I had no issues. Plugged in the bridge and followed the instructions to connect to WiFi (Google WiFi). After a quick firmware update, I turned on the c life bulb and the app found the bulb easily. After enabling the Alexa skill, it worked great via my Echo. The only thing I don’t like about the bulb is how hot they get (too hot to touch the base). The bulbs pull the advertised 11w at 100% brightness, so only $1 or $2 to run each year. Overall, I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few months ago and they were fine but now nothing works. The app is broken and now you just have expensive lights. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Betty J.

product_meta.title: GE Lighting 26828 C - Life Starter Kit, 2 Piece
product_meta.description: C - life starter kit by GE Lighting. The every day LED light bulb that does more so you can too! optimal light, controllable and lasts 20 years.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa or Google Home for voice control (sold separately)
ALEXA ENABLED: When paired with C-Reach use your voice and an Alexa enabled device to turn lights on and off, brighten, dim and change color from AM light to daytime light to PM light
CREATE CUSTOM LIGHT SCHEDULES: Use the C by GE app to schedule when lights turn on and off—great for waking up in the morning and security at night

SET SCENES: Create the perfect ambiance with the right light for movie night, bedtime or getting home—create the ideal brightness and color from your smart phone and then use your voice to turn scenes on and off

CONTROL BULBS INDIVUALLY OR GROUP TOGETHER: C by GE provides flexibility to control each light bulb individually or create groups like “family room” so that you can brighten, dim, turn on and turn off your lights at the same time using your voice or the C by GE app

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars69 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
